Question: Shenzhen Kenvox Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Kenvox Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: OEM Manufacturing Services

- 34 years of history, with 3 own factories and 4 service bases
- Provides design, engineering, and manufacturing expertise for a wide range of products
- Offers project management, confidentiality, communication, and quality control
- Testimonials from clients highlight strong project management, problem-solving, and fair pricing
- Specializes in tool/mold making, plastic, silicone, and metal production, and post processes
- Focuses on quality and customer satisfaction

For more information, visit www.kenvox.com
